arm_group.description: Questioner for institutional employee about Institutional Capacity
Questioner for medical and assistant staffs about Educational Effectiveness
Questioner for medical, assistant staffs and patients about Quality Assurance System in Health-care

brief_summary.textblock:
This work aimed to prepare the obstetrics and gynecology department for high education and
      health care accreditation.

clinical_study.brief_title: Quality Assurance of Obstetrics and Gynecology Department
clinical_study.condition: Problems With Access to Health Care

detailed_description.textblock:
For Institutional Capacity and Educational Effectiveness we have used a special questioner
      for assessment (Met or Not Met Questioner). For Quality Assurance System in Health-care we
      used a special questioner which contain several items each of them may be A ,B or C. A=
      structured standards, and are scored as M= Met or N=Not Met or NA=Not Applicable ,The B &C
      standards are implementation standards . these standards are scored either on the number of
      observations , documentation of deficiencies , or non compliance with the standards.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:

          -  Female patients attending the obstetrics and gynecology department

          -  Medical and assistant medical staffs

          -  institutional employees

        Exclusion criteria:

          -  Female patients complaining from disorders not included in the obstetrics and
             gynecology department activities.

          -  Male patients.

intervention.description: Obstetrics and gynecology health problems questionnaire for patients Educational effectiveness special questionnaire for medical staffs Institutional capacity special questionnaire for institution employees

clinical_study.official_title: Quality Assurance of Obstetrics and Gynecology Department

primary_outcome.description:
QA=Quality Assurance
Institutional Capacity
Educational Effectiveness
Obstetrical and Gynecological disorders of health care

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Health Services Research
